bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, internal control routing, Stealth dropper post routing, ISCG 03 mount, magnesium EVO Link, Mino Link, 160mm travel

components.description: Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing, 15mm alloy axle front hub, Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing 142x12 rear hub w/Bontrager Duster Disc 32-hole double-walled Tubeless Ready rims
Bontrager Rhythm Elite, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Avid Custom X9 trail hydraulic disc
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump, chainguide
